pkgmetadata.longdescription: High Dimensional Mean Comparison with Projection and Cross- Fitting // Provides interpretable High-dimensional Mean Comparison methods (HMC). For example, users can use them to assess the difference in gene expression between two treatment groups. It is not a gene-by-gene comparison. Instead, we focus on the interplay between features and are interested in those that are predictive of the group label. The methods are valid frequentist tests and give sparse estimates indicating which features contribute to the test results.
